headline: Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (BMY): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Bristol-Myers Squibb Company on Disruptive Analytics’ Substack by Magnus Ofstad. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BMY. Bristol-Myers Squibb Company’s share was trading at $55.05 as of January 30th. BMY’s trailing and forward P/E were 18.28 and 9.09, respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
